amendment.description: To require the Director of Science and Technology of the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to develop15-year projections and assessments of the needs of the intelligence community to ensure a robust federal scientific and engineering workforce and the means to recruit such a workforce.

vote.text: Amendment SA 846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 846 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562) To require the Director of Science and Technology of the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to develop15-year projections and assessments of the needs of the intelligence community to ensure a robust federal scientific and engineering workforce and the means to recruit such a workforce.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 846 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 843.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
